description: This file defines the app theme for a Flutter project, including color schemes, styling for various UI components, and decoration styles used throughout the app.

methods.name: buildOceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object featuring a custom color scheme and styling parameters for the Flutter app.

methods.name: oceanSurfaceDecoration
methods.description: Provides a BoxDecoration with a gradient, rounded corners, and shadow, used for decorating surface elements within the UI.
